page.title: 18My Pets
page.content: These are the pets I own:3 dogs, 4 cats,2 rabbits, 1 canary, 1 budgerigar, 1 hamster, and 1 gerbil. Soon I will have another rabbit and a guinea pig. I have more different kinds of pet than any other child at Samuel Barlow School. We have so many because my mum loves pets. I like all of them but my favourite is is the canary. We care well for all of our pets. My mum has worked out that it costs us about Â£4 a week to look after them. People have pets for their company; it's especially nice for elderly people living on their own to have 'someone' to talk to,love and care for.
